title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
With Colin out, Doug Gottlieb fills in with the latest on the future of the Brooklyn Nets as Kyrie Irving has been given permission to seek a sign and trade as free agency approaches. He points out the one NFL team that tried to “buy” their way into a good culture and why that approach never works. Plus, NBA insider Ric Bucher joins the show to tell Doug if Kyrie will end up reuniting with LeBron James on the Lakers.  

 

#douggottliebshow

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
With Colin out, Doug Gottlieb fills in with the latest on the future of the Brooklyn Nets as Kyrie Irving has been given permission to seek a sign and trade as free agency approaches. He points out the one NFL team that tried to “buy” their way into a good culture and why that approach never works. Plus, NBA insider Ric Bucher joins the show to tell Doug if Kyrie will end up reuniting with LeBron James on the Lakers.  

 

#douggottliebshow
